description: silver oval box with dual chambers and hinged covers; apple tree and an 'A' on one cover, a pear tree and an 'E' on the other, Latin inscription at side; hammered sides
inscription:
Inscription and Mark

at bottom edge of body opposite end and same side as marks, engraved: [Gilbert Marks 1899]; at sides of box, in raised letters: [SED QVOMODO/NON QVO]
markings: under edge of each cover: three marks; on exterior of box at short side: four marks
title: Oval snuff box
